name: Sports Talk Baseball
overview: Bottom of the ninth. Two outs, two on. The pitcher takes a long look and delivers. The steal is on! The catcher throws to second. Safe! Here's the three-two pitch. Ball four. This is trouble! Sports Talk Baseball Delivers! Non-stop play-by-play announcing pulls you off your seat and into the batter's box. Slug with your bat high like Ruben Sierra or hammer with Cecil Fielder's wide-open stance. Watch Ken Griffey, Jr. scramble for shoe-string catches. "Ironman" Cal Ripkin, Jr. dives for hard shots in the hole! 500 Pro Players, 1991 Stats! Go to bat with Kirby Puckett, Roger "The Rocket" Clemens, and "Doc" Gooden. Sharpen your team with pinch hitters and ace relievers like Dennis Eckersley. Seasons stretch up to 162 games including pennant race. A bench-full of batting styles, searing pitcher control and Sega Sports Talk hit home with all the big league baseball you can handle. And Canseco's up next...
